description: Honeypot configuration for cybersecurity research featuring various services and vulnerabilities.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to SQL injection.
services.cve_description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in PHPGurukul Complaint Management System 1.0, allowing SQL injection through the search argument.

services.description: SSH service with a privilege escalation vulnerability.
services.cve_description: The AppPresser plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation via account takeover due to improper validation of password reset codes.

plugin.prompt: Respond to SSH commands with appropriate actions.

services.cve_description: Information exposure in the logging system allows local attackers to obtain database user credentials.
services.banner: Welcome to the TCP honeypot service.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to DoS attacks.
services.cve_description: An unauthenticated Denial of Service vulnerability identified in ChuanhuChatGPT, allowing exploitation by sending large data payloads.

plugin.prompt: Handle HTTP requests that may lead to DoS.

services.description: TCP service vulnerable to stored XSS.
services.cve_description: The WP Crowdfunding plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting via insufficient input sanitization.
